API Reference

run_cissvae(data[, val_proportion, ...])

End-to-end pipeline to train a Clustering-Informed Shared-Structure Variational Autoencoder (CISS-VAE).

vae.CISSVAE(*args, **kwargs)

cluster_dataset.ClusterDataset(*args, **kwargs)

autotune.SearchSpace([num_hidden_layers, ...])

Defines tunable and fixed hyperparameter ranges. Input for 'autotune' function. [] -> pick items from list. () -> tuple, creates a range (min, max, step). x -> use single value.

autotune.autotune(search_space, train_dataset)

Optuna-based hyperparameter search for VAE model.

train_initial.train_vae_initial(model, ...)

Train a VAE on masked data with validation set aside inside the ClusterDataset.

train_refit.impute_and_refit_loop(model, ...)

Iterative impute-refit loop with validation MSE early stopping. :returns: * imputed_df (pd.DataFrame) -- Final imputed values produced by the best (early-stopped) model. * best_model (torch.nn.Module) -- Copy of the best-performing model encountered during the loop. * best_dataset (ClusterDataset) -- Copy of the dataset corresponding to best_model's imputations. * refit_history_df (pd.DataFrame) -- Per-loop history aligned to train_vae_initial's history schema so you can pd.concat([history_df, refit_history_df], ignore_index=True) later.

run_cissvae.run_cissvae(data[, ...])

End-to-end pipeline to train a Clustering-Informed Shared-Structure Variational Autoencoder (CISS-VAE).

run_cissvae.cluster_on_missing(data[, ...])

Given pandas dataframe with missing data, clusters on missingness pattern and returns cluster labels.

run_cissvae.cluster_on_missing_prop(...[, ...])

Cluster columns (biomarkers) using per-sample proportions of missingness.

helpers.get_imputed_df(model, data_loader[, ...])

Given trained model and cluster dataset object, get imputed dataset.

helpers.plot_vae_architecture(model[, ...])

Plots a horizontal schematic of the VAE architecture, showing shared and cluster-specific layers.
